LanguageData.Desc_Droid_Hibernate: Send assigned droid to hibetnate on this pad
LanguageData.Desc_Droid_Hibernate_All_Assigned: Send droids with assigned hibernation pad to hibernate on their pad
LanguageData.Desc_Droid_Hibernate_All: Send all droids to hibernate on assigned pad or any free hibernation pad
LanguageData.Desc_Droid_Hibernate_Pawn: Send this droid to assigned pad or any free hibernation pad
LanguageData.affectSkynetHibernation_Explanation: Control hibernation behavior of terminators (from Skynet mod)
LanguageData.affectSkynetHibernation_ToolTip: Terminators can be assigned to hibernation pad. "Hibernate droids" button will affect terminators with assigned pad when enabled.
LanguageData.showHibernateAssignedDroidsButton_Explan: Display "Hibernate droids" button on hibernation pad
LanguageData.showHibernateAssignedDroidsButton_ToolTi: Enables or disables button on hibernation pad
LanguageData.showHibernateAllDroidsButton_Explanation: Display "Hibernate all droids" button on hibernation pad
LanguageData.showHibernateAllDroidsButton_ToolTip: Enables or disables button on hibernation pad
